뉴스제목: Hack Suspicion at Giant Bitcoin Exchange! Deposits and Withdrawals Suspended! Here Are the Details
본문: Cryptocurrency exchange XT.com has suspended withdrawals from its platform following reports of a suspected $1.7 million hack. Crypto Exchange XT.com Suspends Withdrawals Amid $1.7 Million Hack Concerns In a statement today, the exchange attributed the suspension to “wallet upgrade and maintenance.” Shortly after the announcement, blockchain security firm PeckShield reported an “abnormal transfer” from XT.com wallets, suggesting a potential breach. The exchange later acknowledged the issue, stating that there was an “abnormal transfer of platform wallet assets,” but has yet to confirm the incident as a hack. XT.com reassured users that their assets were safe, stating that the platform “holds 1.5 times more reserves than user assets to ensure maximum security.” PeckShield revealed that the suspected hacker exchanged the stolen funds for 461.58 Ether (ETH). The exchanged crypto remains at an Ethereum address designated by the security firm. About XT.com Founded in 2018 and registered in the Seychelles, XT.com is a centralized exchange offering over 1,000 digital currencies. At the time of writing, its daily trading volume was around $3.4 billion. While the exchange has reassured users of its financial stability, concerns about its security measures remain. XT.com has not provided a timeline for resuming withdrawals or disclosed whether additional investigations are ongoing. This incident highlights the ongoing vulnerabilities in cryptocurrency platforms, even as exchanges claim robust security measures. *This is not investment advice. 본문: Crypto startup Bleap, founded by ex-Revolut employees, has bagged in $2.3 million to make it easier to spend crypto with debit cards. Bleap, a U.K.-based blockchain startup building a wallet-connected debit card, has raised $2.3 million in pre-seed funding led by Ethereal Ventures, according to a Nov. 28 announcement on X. Other backers include Maven11, Alliance DAO, Robot Ventures, Credibly Neutral, and angel investors. With the funding, the startup’s valuation reached $10 million. https://twitter.com/BleapApp/status/1862084573603025214 Bleap’s card linked to Mastercard lets users spend stablecoins without conversion fees and offers up to 2% cashback. From the on-chain perspective, the startup leverages Arbitrum ( ARB ), an Ethereum layer-2 solution, as well as multi-party computation for wallet access. You might also like: Best crypto debit cards in 2024 Bleap to expand services under MiCA regulations Founded by Joao Alves and Guilherme Gomes, Bleap is registered as a virtual asset service provider in Poland. The startup plans to expand under Europe’s MiCA regulations and enter Latin America by 2025. Currently in beta, Bleap aims for a full launch in Q1 2025, with a token rollout slated for 2026. In September, Mastercard revealed that its European crypto users can now spend Bitcoin ( BTC ) and other tokens stored in self-custodial wallets through the newly launched Spend debit card. Created in partnership with crypto payments provider Mercuryo, the card is tied to a euro-denominated account, enabling users to make payments for goods and services at more than 100 million merchants worldwide. 뉴스제목: If you invested $1,000 in Bitcoin when Trump won the election, you’d now have this much
본문: The election of Donald Trump to the office of President will go down in history as one of the most pivotal events of the year. Although pollsters were projecting a tight race, in the end, the GOP candidate secured victory over incumbent Vice President Kamala Harris in each swing state. Some of Trump’s proposed economic policies — in particular, his preference for tariffs, have caused widespread worry among market participants. They’re far from a done deal — Trump’s first term did include a bevy of promises that were ultimately not kept . However, the markets have certainly been fairly bullish regarding one thing — and that’s the President-elect’s stance on cryptocurrency. Beyond his own dealings in the space, through World Liberty Financial, which recently got a $30 million investment from Tron ( TRX ) founder Justin Sun, Trump has publicly supported crypto, intends to name a wide bevy of pro-crypto experts to hold public office , and intends to establish a strategic crypto reserve for the United States. Unsurprisingly, all of this has contributed significantly to the current bull run that the leading digital asset Bitcoin ( BTC ) is in. To clearly demonstrate how significant this upswing has been, let’s take a look at a simple hypothetical situation — how much money an investor would have if they had invested $1,000 in Bitcoin on November 5, the day of the election. Bitcoin prices have soared since the 2024 election On November 5, one BTC was priced at roughly $68,290 — having receded to that point from a prior $72,780 high on October 30. Unlike most recent presidential elections, this one was called rather quickly — Vice President Harris conceded just a day later, on November 6. Bitcoin price chart, November 5 to November 28. Source: Finbold At press time, one Bitcoin is trading at approximately $95,530 — a mark which represents a 40.22% increase compared to November 5 prices. Accordingly, a $1,000 investment made on November 5 would be worth $1,398 at the time of publication. This offers an interesting backdrop to reflect on entry points. For comparison’s sake, if you invested in BTC exactly six months ago, you would have made a negligibly better return of over 40% — or $1,404. If, however, you had bought $1,000 worth of Bitcoin on January 1, your gains would currently stand at 125% — in other words, $2,252. Bitcoin price YTD chart. Source: Finbold While some entry points are obviously superior to others, for now, BTC seems to be acting in accordance with one of the most widely-held maxims governing traditional financial assets — time in the market outperforms timing the market , and is much easier to accomplish. Although Bitcoin has hit a roadblock on its path to $100,000 , dollar-cost-averaging purchases are still likely to outperform attempts to buy a potential upcoming dip. Featured image via Shutterstock The post If you invested $1,000 in Bitcoin when Trump won the election, you’d now have this much appeared first on Finbold .

뉴스제목: Ethereum Eyes $10,000 as “Second Bull Run” Takes Shape — Analyst
본문: Ethereum (ETH) continued to trade strongly on Thursday, sustaining its bullish momentum after it broke past minor resistance at $3,480 earlier this week. The cryptocurrency has seen a 36% gain over the past month, pushing its market capitalization to approximately $435 billion. Notably, amid this rally, analysts are forecasting even greater price heights, with growing optimism about the cryptocurrency’s potential as the year comes to an end. CryptoQuant analyst “Crypto SunMoon” identified Ethereum’s current rally as the beginning of its “secondary bull run.” In a tweet, the analyst chart highlighted previous bull cycles, showing that Ethereum has consistently exceeded its earlier price peaks during subsequent rallies. “Ethereum’s secondary bull run has begun. Historically, Ethereum’s second bull cycle has always significantly surpassed the price levels achieved in the first cycle.” He noted. This historical insight suggests the potential for substantial growth ahead, with past trends supporting bullish price projections for ETH. On the technical front, analyst Ali Martinez noted that Ethereum’s multi-year ascending price channel remains strong. He highlighted that recent trading activity has successfully broken through key resistance levels in the $2,800–$3,000 range, setting up ETH for further gains. “Our mid-term target forETH remains $6,000… Long-term target: $10,000,” wrote Martinez. On the longer time horizon, analyst CryptoWolf shared a bold prediction. He pointed to a three-year triangle consolidation pattern in Ethereum’s price chart, starting in November 2021, and a cup and handle pattern stating that a breakout could target $20,000. “No matter how you look at the ETH chart, it’s incredibly bullish. One way to view it is as a 3-year cup and handle, with major resistance at $4k. Once that’s cleared, a measured move places it north of $15k. It’s the most asymmetric bet you can make right now,” he tweeted . Meanwhile, CryptoQuant analyst JA Maartun noted that Ethereum’s open interest had hit an all-time high of $16.8 billion, with a 24-hour increase of 19%. Maartun viewed this as a signal of increased investor interest in purchasing Ethereum, tweeting, “Popcorn ready? This guarantees heavy fireworks.” This update comes after the pundit warned of increased market risks. Just a day earlier, he had stated that Ethereum’s price surge was “being fueled by leveraged positions, indicating heightened risk in the market. This often presents a strong short-term shorting opportunity.” At press time, ETH was trading at $3,605, reflecting a 4.84% surge over the past 24 hours.

뉴스제목: More Boost For XRP As Ripple Expands Blockchain Innovation with Tokenized Money Market Fund
본문: Ripple continues to break new ground in tokenized finance, unveiling the first-ever tokenized money market fund on the XRP Ledger (XRPL). Announced Monday, this milestone is a collaboration with Archax, the first FCA-regulated digital asset exchange, and Abrdn, a leading UK asset manager with over £500 billion in assets under management. The tokenized fund, part of Abrdn’s £3.8 billion US Dollar Liquidity Fund (Lux), is set to bring financial assets onto the blockchain, marking a significant step toward institutional adoption of tokenized real-world assets (RWAs). Ripple also pledged $5 million to support this initiative as part of a broader fund to foster RWAs on the XRP Ledger (XRPL), with investments managed by various asset managers. “ There is now real momentum building for tokenized real-world assets, and Archax is at the forefront of tokenizing assets such as equities, debt instruments, and money market funds.” Graham Rodford, CEO of Archax, noted. Markus Infanger, RippleX’s Senior Vice President, added, “The arrival of abrdn’s money market fund on XRPL demonstrates how real-world assets are being tokenized to enhance operational efficiencies, further reinforcing XRPL as a leading blockchain for RWA tokenization.” That said, this announcement coincides with Ripple’s ongoing development of RLUSD, a US dollar-linked stablecoin launched in beta earlier this year. Designed for enterprise clients, RLUSD is backed by partners like Bitstamp, Bitso, MoonPay, and Bullish, with liquidity from market makers such as B2C2 and Keyrock. Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse recently described RLUSD as a “high-quality stablecoin” set to become a gold standard in payments, DeFi, and RWAs. Public access to RLUSD will follow regulatory approval, with Garlinghouse emphasizing the firm’s focus on compliance. Notably, industry forecasts predict tokenized assets could grow to $16 trillion by 2030, underscoring the significance of Ripple’s initiatives. Ripple is leveraging the XRPL’s robust features, such as tokenization, escrow, and trading, to drive institutional-grade decentralized finance (DeFi) applications. While pioneering blockchain finance, Ripple continues its legal battle with the SEC, which accused the company in 2020 of raising $1.3 billion through unregistered XRP sales. In July 2023, Ripple secured a partial victory when a judge ruled secondary sales of XRP did not violate securities laws. However, institutional sales exceeding $700 million were not exempt. In August 2024, Ripple was fined $125 million, significantly lower than the SEC’s demand of $2 billion. The SEC has since appealed parts of the ruling. Despite these challenges, Ripple remains committed to advancing blockchain solutions.
카테고리: BLOCKCHAIN | FIAT | MARKET | REGULATION | WALLET | XRP

Let’s break it down. Hong Kong’s Crypto …

뉴스제목: Hong Kong proposes crypto tax breaks to compete as global financial hub
본문: Hong Kong has unveiled a proposal to exempt cryptocurrency gains from taxes for hedge funds, private equity, and family offices. The tax exemption plan, currently under a six-week public consultation, also covers investments in private credit, overseas property, and carbon credits. If implemented, the tax break could attract global liquidity and bolster Hong Kong’s digital economy. According to a recent report , the move is a part of Hong Kong’s strategy to strengthen its standing as a leading crypto financial hub and position it competitively against contending jurisdictions which offer similar tax incentives. For instance, Hong Kong faces competition from nations like Singapore , which implemented its Variable Capital Company (VCC) framework in 2020. The VCC framework allows fund managers to consolidate multiple investment portfolios under a single legal entity, providing operational flexibility and tax efficiencies. It now hosts over 1,000 funds, attracting international investors. In response, Hong Kong has been promoting its Open-Ended Fund Company (OFC) structure, which allows funds to be set up with flexible share issuance and redemption options while benefiting from tax exemptions on certain fund-related activities. Since October 2023, over 450 funds have been launched under the OFC scheme. The latest move to introduce tax breaks on crypto gains is an extension of Hong Kong’s efforts to make the city a more attractive destination for global fund managers and investors. Commenting on the development, Justin d’Anethan, an analyst, described the tax exemption as a “strategic” move. He noted that Hong Kong aims to attract “talent, capital, and innovation” in a decentralised, fast-moving industry through lower taxes and clear regulations. Hong Kong’s focus on crypto investing As previously reported by Invezz, the proposal was first hinted at by Christopher Hui, Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury, in late October. Hui said at the time that the measure forms part of a larger strategy to enhance Hong Kong’s role in managing a broad range of financial assets, including cryptocurrencies. This effort, he said, was essential for Hong Kong to remain competitive on a global scale. Hong Kong has made additional strides to position itself as a global crypto hub. ZA Bank, the city’s largest virtual bank, recently introduced services allowing retail users to trade Bitcoin and Ether. In July, the bank was authorised to hold reserve assets for stablecoin issuers under Hong Kong’s new regulations. Adding to its crypto initiatives, the Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited launched a Virtual Asset Index Series on November 15. This platform provides real-time benchmarks for Bitcoin and Ether, offering transparency and reliability for investors engaging in digital asset trading. Meanwhile, Hong Kong’s Securities and Futures Commission has also shown its interest in licensing more crypto exchanges by the end of 2024. Currently, three licensed exchanges operate in the region, serving both retail and institutional investors. The most recent approval was granted to Hong Kong Virtual Asset Exchange Limited in October. During the 2024 Hong Kong FinTech Week, Eric Yip, the SFC’s Executive Director for Intermediaries, confirmed that a final list of fully licensed crypto exchanges will be released by year-end. The post Hong Kong proposes crypto tax breaks to compete as global financial hub appeared first on Invezz

뉴스제목: AI sets Bitcoin price for Cyber Monday
본문: The question of whether – and even more so when – Bitcoin ( BTC ) is set to cross the long-awaited threshold at $100,000 has been the talk of the globe throughout November. Indeed, having risen approximately 40% between election day and press time on November 28, the world’s premier cryptocurrency is closer than ever to the ambitious target and even found itself within $1,000 of the six digit figure on November 22. Still, the high volatility and several successive corrections – started in earnest on Sunday, November 24 – have reignited the question of whether $100,000 is truly within reach or if a plunge toward $80,000 would come first. With the current setup having the coin somewhere in between Bitcoin’s current price of $95,413, Finbold decided to consult one of the most advanced artificial intelligence (AI) models available to determine whether investors will be welcomed back from Thanksgiving by BTC at the new all-time high (ATH) or something entirely different. BTC 30-day price chart. Source: Finbold ChatGPT predicts BTC price after Thanksgiving ChatGPT-4o proved rather direct when predicting Bitcoin’s Cyber Monday price. It estimated that the current momentum, driven by heightened institutional interest and investor bullishness but tempered by the likely lower volume and amplified volatility, would lead to BTC at $99,200. ChatGPT sets Bitcoin price target for Cyber Monday. Source: Finbold & ChatGPT-4o When asked about the lower volatility, the AI explained that multiple studies – such as the one conducted in 2022 by Arcane Research and transmitted by Finbold , among other outlets – indicate that the U.S. accounts for much of the cryptocurrency market trading volume. With the stock market closed during the holidays and investors generally seeking to distance themselves temporarily from the buzz, fewer people are likely to be active between Thursday, November 28, and Cyber Monday, December 2. Still, ChatGPT pointed out that this likely low volume will increase volatility generated by each individual trade but also warned that the situation might still not favor extreme moves. AI forecasts when Bitcoin will finally hit $100,000 Additionally, when asked what are the likely outer bounds of Bitcoin’s price range before it hits the forecasted $99,200 on Cyber Monday, the AI explained they stand at $94,000 – indicating corrections akin to what was seen on Tuesday, November 26, are unlikely – and at $100,500 – thus confirming it believes a new all-time high (ATH) will be set but not maintained. ChatGPT estimates the likely BTC price range in trading between Thanksgiving and Cyber Monday. Source: Finbold & ChatGPT-4o ChatGPT was also asked to predict when BTC would hit the predicted high point, and it explained that the current trends indicate it will happen on Saturday, November 30. ChatGPT predicts when BTC will hit the Thanksgiving to Cyber Monday trading range top. Source: Finbold & ChatGPT-4o Finally, the AI provided the specific time when Bitcoin is expected to climb $500 above the long-awaited $100,000: 3 PM UTC – 10 AM EST. Featured image via Shutterstock The post AI sets Bitcoin price for Cyber Monday appeared first on Finbold .

뉴스제목: Bitcoin Well On Track To Hit $740,000 By April 2028 — Pantera CEO
본문: Dan Morehead , founder and CEO of Pantera Capital — the first crypto fund in the United States — is forecasting that the price of Bitcoin could smash $700,000 in 2028, roughly a week after the flagship crypto rocketed toward a six-digit price. Despite Bitcoin’s astronomical growth in recent months, Morehead thinks it’s “still early” for BTC and that the cryptocurrency’s bull market has yet to run. Bitcoin’s Path To $740,000 Dan Morehead noted in a Nov. 26 blog post that 5% of financial wealth is now exposed to Bitcoin. Yet, that figure is set to increase with more regulatory clarity in the U.S. as pro-blockchain president-elect Donald Trump heads back to the White House. This would result in faster institutionalization of Bitcoin. BlackRock and Fidelity with spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds have started a “massive transformation,” posited Morehead. “It’s [Bitcoin] already done three orders of magnitude,” Morehead wrote. He revealed that his investment company’s crypto-focused Pantera Bitcoin Fund, which was launched in 2013, has notched an over 131,000% lifetime return on its first Bitcoin purchase at $7. “Another one seems plausible.” Per the Pantera CEO, Bitcoin has been on a trendline that will push its value to roughly $740,000 by April 2028 (a nearly 670% growth from the current price point) if it continues its growth pattern. The world’s oldest cryptocurrency was trading for about 2.3% higher at around $95,294 at publication time. “I just can’t help thinking that we still have many more years of very compelling returns.” $15 Trillion Market Cap For Bitcoin $740,000 is “not an inconceivable number, relative to $500 trillion in financial assets,” he explained. At this price, Bitcoin would boast a market capitalization of a whopping $15 trillion. “I can imagine an investor thinking: ‘Bitcoin has doubled this year. Well, I guess I missed it,’” Morehead said. “That’s the wrong mindset.” Furthermore, Morehead told CNBC’s Squawk Box on Nov. 27 that he doesn’t think Bitcoin could ever crash to zero now as it has reached “escape velocity” with 300 million investors around the world owning it.

뉴스제목: 5 Best Crypto Presale Coins for 2025 [Updated List for 2025]
본문: The crypto world is alive with stories of investors who turned small beginnings into staggering profits. While some cash in on Bitcoin’s early days or Ethereum’s rise, others have ridden the wave of lesser-known coins that exploded in value. The question is are you letting the next big opportunity slip through your fingers? Every year brings a fresh crop of innovative projects, and 2025 is no different. With the crypto market evolving rapidly, new players are emerging every day, ready to capture the spotlight. This could be the year to act, not just watch. Because waiting could mean watching others seize the gains you’re dreaming of. Here’s a roundup of the best crypto presale coins for 2025 — including BlockDAG, PEPU, Flockerz, Crypto All-Stars, and Moo Deng. 1. BlockDAG (BDAG): Scaling New Crypto Heights BlockDAG (BDAG) leads this list of best crypto presale coins for 2025 — a project making waves as 2024 nears its close. Designed with a cutting-edge DAG-PoW hybrid architecture, it enables parallel transaction processing, offering faster and more efficient solutions to blockchain’s scalability issues. After raising an impressive $20 million in under 48 hours, BlockDAG’s total presale now stands at over $150 million with over 16.6 billion coins sold. The project’s growing community of over 170,000 holders shows that BlockDAG presale reflects strong market confidence. Plus, BlockDAG’s successful mainnet development and ongoing auditing further highlight the team’s focus on transparency and innovation. Analysts predict BDAG could deliver a remarkable 30,000x ROI and potentially reach $1 by 2025 and $30 by 2030. Backed by influential crypto experts and a robust roadmap, BlockDAG combines advanced technology with real-world applicability. As one of the most promising crypto projects for 2025, BlockDAG tops the list for its ability to merge scalability with community engagement, paving the way for long-term growth. 2. Pepe Unchained (PEPU): Building the Future of Meme Coins Following the trail of promising investments, PEPU gains traction as a notable project in the meme coin space for 2025. After a strong first pick, PEPU took the spotlight, raising over $40 million in its presale, reflecting solid community interest. The project focuses on creating a Layer-2 ecosystem that offers faster transactions and lower costs. Additionally, the developer grant program fosters innovation, encouraging builders to contribute to the ecosystem. These efforts keep PEPU relevant and adaptable in a rapidly changing market. 3. Crypto All-Stars (STARS): Multi-Chain Mastery Crypto All-Stars (STARS) is another promising pick in the list of best crypto presale coins for 2025. Its presale has raised over $4.4 million, reflecting the increased interest in this microcap meme coin. STARS introduces MemeVault, a multi-chain staking platform supporting 11 meme coins and offering diverse rewards. Built on the ERC-1155 standard, MemeVault ensures compatibility across major blockchains like Ethereum, Base, and Solana. While meme coins can be volatile, which may affect returns, the project’s innovative staking approach sets it apart as a unique option in the evolving crypto market. 4. Flockerz (FLOCK): Vote-to-Earn Innovator The third one on the list of best crypto presale coins for 2025 is Flockerz (FLOCK). Branded as the "people’s meme coin," it blends decentralization with a vote-to-earn model. All FLOCK holders are part of the Flocktopia DAO, shaping decisions on marketing, listings, and features while earning rewards. Its presale has already raised $2.8 million, appealing to whales and retail investors. However, some may find transparency a concern with anonymous developers and no KYC verification. Despite this, its community-driven governance offers a refreshing take on how meme coins can empower their holders in a decentralized ecosystem. 5. Moo Deng (MOODENG): Hippo Hype Hits Blockchain Following Flockerz, Moo Deng (MOODENG) is another one of the best crypto presale coins for 2025. Inspired by a viral baby hippo from a Thai zoo, Moo Deng blends internet culture with blockchain innovation. Built on Solana, it has gained attention for its unique concept and widespread appeal. According to analysts, after reaching an all-time high of $0.69, the coin is expected to consolidate before potentially reaching $1.51 by 2026. Its connection to a real-world mascot adds a layer of charm, making it a standout in the meme coin space. Which One to Choose From The Best Crypto Presale Coins for 2025? As we conclude our roundup of the best crypto presale coins for 2025, each coin shows its potential and strength that sets it apart from the rest. From Pepe Unchained's innovative ecosystem and Crypto All-Stars' unique staking platform to Flockerz's community-driven model and Moo Deng's viral appeal offers distinct opportunities — all these coins show growth potential. However, BlockDAG (BDAG) leads as the prime choice for its advanced DAG-PoW architecture, strong market backing, and impressive community that highlight its potential for scalability and significant returns. For traders seeking a blend of innovation and stability, BlockDAG represents the most promising option as we move into 2025. Funding Source: The purchases were funded through a $1 billion offering of 0% convertible senior notes due 2030 that closed last week. MARA said it plans to allocate approximately $199 million of the funds raised to repurchase existing convertible notes due in 2026. The remaining proceeds, approximately $160 million, are earmarked for further Bitcoin purchases and corporate initiatives. Market Impact and Stock Performance Stock Move: MARA shares closed up 7.81% at $26.92 on Wednesday. The stock has gained 42.13% in the past month and is up 17.4% year-to-date with a current market cap of $9 billion, according to Google Finance. Industry Activity: MARA’s strategic Bitcoin purchases come amid a wave of high-profile investments in the cryptocurrency by public companies. Broader Market Context MicroStrategy’s Record Purchase: Earlier this month, another institutional bitcoin giant, MicroStrategy, purchased 55,500 BTC for approximately $5.4 billion, bringing its total holdings to 386,700 BTC. SOS Ltd.'s Entry: Chinese firm SOS Ltd. announced plans to invest $50 million in Bitcoin, sending its stock price up 42.88% on Wednesday. *This is not investment advice. 뉴스제목: Is BONK Rally In Jeopardy? Technical Indicators Confirm Weakness
본문: BONK is facing mounting bearish pressure as technical indicators signal growing weakness in the market. After a brief attempt to stabilize, the token appears to be losing momentum dropping again toward the $0.00004002 for another test, with key metrics pointing to further downside. As BONK navigates these challenging conditions, speculations are on whether the meme coin can reclaim its footing or if deeper losses are inevitable. This analysis dives into BONK’s current market performance under bearish conditions, highlighting the technical indicators that signal potential weakness. Furthermore, we will assess the likelihood of a recovery or a continuation of BONK’s downward trajectory by analyzing critical support levels, market trends, and the broader outlook, Technical Indicators Signal Growing Weakness For BONK On the 4-hour chart, BONK exhibits negative sentiment, trading below the 100-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) as it trends downward toward the $0.00004002 support level. A continued descent to this support suggests that selling pressure is intensifying, and if the support fails to hold, the asset could experience more declines. Also, an analysis of the 4-hour chart reveals that the Relative Strength Index (RSI) has now declined to the 44% level following a previous attempt to rally, which peaked at 49% before losing strength. A declining RSI, particularly as it remains below the neutral 50% level, indicates that bearish momentum is building. If the RSI continues to dip, it could further validate the downtrend, potentially leading to more significant price drops as selling pressure intensifies. Related Reading: BONK In Trouble As Sharp Decline Hints At An Impending Pullback On the daily chart, the meme coin displays notable downward movement, highlighted by a bearish candlestick with a strong rejection wick that has emerged after a failed recovery attempt. The inability to sustain an upside direction implies a lack of buyer confidence and a prevailing negative sentiment in the market. As BONK aims at the $0.00004002 support level, the pressure from sellers could intensify, raising concerns about the possibility of a breakdown. Finally, the 1-day RSI shows increasing negative pressure on the cryptocurrency, with the signal line dropping sharply from the overbought zone to 56%. This decline marks a shift in momentum, indicating that buying strength is weakening and selling pressure is rising. Should the RSI continue to fall, it could signal sustained pessimistic sentiment and declines for BONK. Bounce Back Or Further Decline? Two potential scenarios are likely as BONK faces bearish pressure: a bounce back or further decline. If the meme coin can hold the critical $0.00004002 support level and attract renewed buying interest, it could spark a recovery, possibly reversing the current downtrend and pushing the price to the $0.00006247 resistance range and beyond. Related Reading: Bonk Downward Drift To $0.00002635, Can Bulls Ignite A Trend Reversal? However, if selling pressure persists and BONK fails to sustain the $0.00004002 support level, a deeper decline may follow, with the price potentially dropping to lower support zones, including $0.00002962, $0.00002320, and below. 뉴스제목: Iris Energy Limited Accelerates Expansion Amid Bitcoin Bull Market
본문: Summary Iris Energy Limited leverages 100% renewable energy for Bitcoin mining and AI/HPC services, prioritizing sustainability and scalability for future growth. The company is accelerating Bitcoin mining capacity expansion, targeting 50 EH/s by mid-2025, supported by advanced hardware like S21 Pro miners. With low-cost Bitcoin production at $29,000 per coin and competitive efficiency metrics, IREN is well-positioned for profitability despite price volatility. The Sweetwater data center project, with 1.4GW capacity, highlights IREN’s ambition to scale AI/HPC services alongside Bitcoin mining operations. Despite high Q3 CAPEX, IREN remains undervalued, with a forward P/S ratio of 2.2 and growth prospects in a bullish crypto market. Iris Energy Limited ( IREN ) continues at the forefront of sustainable innovation in its three business areas: Bitcoin mining, high-performance computing [HPC], and artificial intelligence [AI] cloud services. The company has successfully expanded its operations across North America and Australia, using exclusively renewable energy. IREN’s main focus is cost efficiency, scalability, and infrastructure innovation to capitalize on the demand for digital technologies. IREN’s fast growth, with expected production of 50 EH/s by mid-2025, and cutting-edge initiatives in AI and HPC position it favorably in these niches. Also, IREN’s valuation still appears reasonable, especially considering its upcoming growth with Bitcoin’s ongoing bull market. Thus, I reiterate my “Buy” on IREN for long-term investors seeking exposure to the green energy and bitcoin mining sectors. Promising Secular Tailwinds: Business Overview At its core, Iris Energy is a data center company specializing in bitcoin mining, high-performance computing [HPC], and Artificial Intelligence [AI] cloud services. It was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Sidney, Australia, with operations across North America and Australia. Since my article from December 2023, IREN’s stock has substantially appreciated. The key aspects of IREN are its ongoing expansion, focus on renewable energy, and commitment to environmental responsibility. Source: Q1 FY25 Results Presentation. November 26, 2024. Currently, IREN’s primary business area is Bitcoin mining , which reached 31 exahashes per second [EH/s] by the end of Q3 2024. Thanks to the operation of its site in Childress County, Texas, the company is preparing to grow its mining capacity to 50 EH/s by 1H2025. This is much faster than the initially anticipated date timeline of 2H2025. In fact, Childress was designed with infrastructure to support substantial power expansion of up to 50 megawatts monthly. IREN can scale up mining and install new hardware like the S21 Pro miners' machines. It’s worth mentioning that S21 Pro machines are advanced Bitcoin miner devices that work very efficiently. The company has pre-purchased this mining equipment at $18.9 per terahash [TH]. For context, TH is a unit of computational power used to obtain the solution of cryptographic puzzles in the blockchain. Also, IREN secured its S21 Pro miners at a fixed price, which should hedge it from future potential cost increases due to a rapidly appreciating cryptocurrency bull market in 2025. This way, the company can ensure financial predictability. Source: Q1 FY25 Results Presentation. November 26, 2024. The fast growth of the digital world, particularly Bitcoin mining, contrasts with the slower pace of the physical infrastructure required to support it. The current power usage for the Bitcoin mining network demands more than 20 gigawatts (GW) of electricity, and the consumption rises as mining activities expand. Thus, this strains the electricity supply and infrastructure. For instance, if the price of Bitcoin increases to $150,000 , mining will become more profitable, and miners will be incentivized to expand operations. However, such expansion would require an additional 7GW of power capacity. This would translate into an additional power generation and facilities CAPEX of approximately $9 billion . The infrastructure needs time to be developed, and it is a bottleneck in the network expansion that delays mining activities. Source: Q1 FY25 Results Presentation. November 26, 2024. Fortunately, IREN produces a low-cost Bitcoin, with a competitive cost of approximately $29,000 per Bitcoin at a hash rate of 31 EH/s. This cost is lower than many competitors due to highly efficient hardware that reduces energy consumption. Other factors for the low price are the lower electricity costs in Childress, Texas, and the economy of scale that decreases the cost per unit mined. IREN's cost-efficiency is an advantage for the company and positions it for better profitability, even when Bitcoin may lower its prices. Notably, the internal cost for IREN to run 1 EH/s of Bitcoin mining is $30 million, while the market valuation for this capacity is $120 million, highlighting the company's efficient cost structure. This efficiency ensures high returns, with investments in miners and data centers achieving a payback period of two years. Moreover, the scaling from 31 EH/s to 50 EH/s greatly improves profitability, reinforcing IREN's competitive position. Source: Q1 FY25 Results Presentation. November 26, 2024. Lastly, IREN’s other two business areas, AI and HPC , provide an additional diversification layer. For example, the company invested in advanced liquid cooling systems and NVIDIA GPUs to improve performance and efficiency. Also, IREN has installed 1,896 NVIDIA H100 and H200 GPUs to prepare to scale operations in response to customer demand. Transformative 2025: Power, Profit, and Potential IREN updated investors on its Sweetwater data center project in its latest quarterly report . The substation that will power the site will be operational in 15 months, ensuring the infrastructure the project needs. Sweetwater will deliver 1.4GW of power capacity, making it one of the largest power sites in the world. It is designed with 90 EH/s mining capacity and potentially hosts up to 800,000 GPUs for HPC activities. Meanwhile, Bitcoin reached historic highs in November 2024. However, Bitcoin is inherently volatile, so it remains an underlying risk for IREN. Despite this, Donald Trump's electoral victory has fueled optimism, as he ran on a pro-crypto agenda . Analysts anticipate a favorable political and regulatory environment that could encourage Bitcoin adoption, including discussions around the possibility of using Bitcoin as a treasury reserve asset . Source: Seeking Alpha. Moreover, IREN announced it may also start distributions to shareholders in 2025. In theory, these distributions will be supported by increased cash flows from scaling activities and a focus on alternative funding instruments. So, for now, I think IREN’s scaling strategy, low-cost expansion, cryptocurrency tailwinds, and HPC markets make it well-positioned for long-term success. Growth Ahead: Valuation Analysis From a valuation perspective, IREN now trades at a $1.8 billion market cap, making it a midsized company in its sector. This is up roughly 143.5% since I covered it in December 2023, showing that the bull thesis I outlined back then is playing out. As of Q3 2024, its balance sheet held $98.6 million in cash and equivalents against no financial debt. Its book value stands at $1.1 billion, indicating a P/B of 1.6, which inherently denotes a moderate premium. For comparison, its sector’s median P/B is 3.3. Naturally, most of IREN’s book value stems from its PPE worth $966.0 million. Source: Seeking Alpha. Furthermore, according to Seeking Alpha’s dashboard on IREN , the company is projected to generate $809.0 million in revenues by 2026, suggesting a forward P/S of 2.2. This is actually much more reasonable compared to its sector’s median forward P/S of 3.2 . Thus, I think, on balance, IREN’s valuation multiples still appear undervalued in light of its impressive forecasted revenue growth and underlying assets. Moreover, I estimate IREN’s latest quarterly cash burn reached $391.0 million by adding its CFOs and Net CAPEX. This is the company’s main drawback, implying a cash runway of just 0.3 quarters. Thus, it’s evident that there’s a high likelihood of an equity raise relatively soon. Alternatively, I suppose IREN could tap into debt as well, especially since its growth is ramping up rapidly, and its balance sheet isn’t levered at this point. In my view, debt is probably the better choice because it avoids dilution and will probably be manageable, assuming IREN’s future revenue growth materializes. Source: IREN’s latest quarterly report. Additionally, it’s worth mentioning that Q3 2024 seems to have been an unusually capital-intensive quarter for IREN. Using the same approach as before, in Q3 2023, IREN’s cash burn was much more manageable at just $13.9 million . The main discrepancy in these two periods is that IREN seems to have made sizeable CAPEX on PPE and computer hardware for its operations. In my view, this seems reasonable, especially if we assume that the current Bitcoin cycle will probably last until 2025. In fact, I think this large CAPEX ahead of 2025 positions IREN perfectly to capitalize on Bitcoin’s ongoing bull market. Investment Caveats: Risk Analysis So, no additional raises may be necessary if IREN’s focus now transitions into maximizing its recent CAPEX. Moreover, IREN’s margins will likely improve as Childress scales up . Moreover, looking at IREN’s results in Q3 didn’t benefit from the recent Bitcoin price increase to over $90,000 . Those tailwinds will show up in Q4 2024, and there’s a material improvement at those price levels for IREN. Thus, I think it’s fair to remain bullish on IREN into 2025, so I reiterate my “Buy” rating. Source: Q1 FY25 Results Presentation. November 26, 2024. Unfortunately, this is also IREN’s main risk. If the price of Bitcoin declines significantly, it will undoubtedly put pressure on IREN’s revenues and margins. Moreover, it could be a double whammy for the company because it’s rapidly ramping up its CAPEX to capitalize fully on the current cryptocurrency bull market. Similarly, I would like to see IREN now pivot towards bolstering its balance sheet to endure any economic downturns, especially since its revenues are tightly linked to a highly volatile industry. Source: TradingView. Therefore, if IREN fails to capitalize on these current tailwinds or overexpands and doesn’t prioritize its balance sheet, it could lead to significant shareholders post-2025. My bear case for IREN is that by 2025, the company’s balance sheet may not improve enough, and the crypto bull market will end. If that occurs, it could catch IREN off balance, especially after such a massive ramp-up in PPE ahead of 2025. Nevertheless, as it stands today, if management now focuses on prudently reaping the rewards of this bull market , IREN could emerge post-2025 as a premier green cryptocurrency mining operation. Reiterated “Buy”: Conclusion Overall, I think IREN’s latest quarterly results are quite promising. The only yellow flag is that I see a major CAPEX commitment in Q3, which should pay off nicely in Q4 and 2025. After all, Bitcoin didn’t spike above $90,000 until November 2024. So, those tailwinds will show up in subsequent reports. However, IREN needs to adopt a more prudent capital allocation approach now and focus on riding the Bitcoin wave rather than risking over-expanding. Still, I feel it’s fair to reiterate my “Buy” rating on IREN due to its compelling valuation, forecasted revenue growth, and promising secular tailwinds.

뉴스제목: Binance announces PayDay, a shopping event with $200k in cashback rewards
본문: Binance , the largest cryptocurrency platform, has announced Binance PayDay, a promotional event meant to encourage crypto usage during the holiday shopping season, as reported to Finbold on Thursday, November 28. PayDay runs from November 28 to December 12, 2024, and features $200,000 in PEPE cashback rewards. Binance PayDay promotions The initiative features two promotions designed to encourage crypto purchases. In the first promotion (also called Promotion A), available to the first 19,480 qualifying users, those who spend at least $20 during a single transaction with participating merchants can earn $10 in PEPE tokens. On the other hand, the second promotion (also named Promotion B) targets high spenders and features a $5,200 PEPE prize pool for the top 100 users who accumulate $200 or more in purchases in any supported cryptocurrency. Top performers can receive up to $350 worth of PEPE within 30 days. All relevant information can be found on the Binance PayDay page , and eligible merchant transactions will be listed on the Binance Pay checkout page. Introducing crypto to everyday shopping Rachel Conlan, Chief Marketing Officer at Binance, emphasized the importance of making crypto payments more convenient: “Binance PayDay is all about allowing users to experience the convenience and benefits of crypto payments during the holiday season. With cashback rewards and a wide range of participating merchants, we’re making it easier than ever for users to shop for everything from everyday essentials to luxury items while enjoying the speed, security, and cost-effectiveness of utilizing Binance Pay. This campaign showcases how crypto can enhance shopping, offering users greater value and flexibility.” The Binance Pay solution is now supported by over 11,000 merchants worldwide and sees 28 million users each month relying on digital assets for a variety of purchases ranging from simple groceries to luxury vehicles. By promoting crypto payments during the upcoming holiday season, Binance seeks to showcase the potential of digital assets in everyday shopping scenarios. The post Binance announces PayDay, a shopping event with $200k in cashback rewards appeared first on Finbold .

뉴스제목: Chinese Firm SOS Ltd Embraces Bitcoin with $50M Investment
본문: In a move that boosted its stock value significantly, Chinese financial services firm SOS Ltd will be investing $50 million in Bitcoin, citing its confidence in the cryptocurrency’s long-term value and aligning with a rising trend of corporate adoption driven by favorable regulatory developments. Significant Investment in Bitcoin SOS Ltd has announced plans to invest $50 million in Bitcoin , marking a significant move toward embracing the cryptocurrency as a strategic asset. The decision, approved by the company's board, reflects a long-term belief in Bitcoin’s role as a store of value. This move aligns with similar actions by global firms looking to capitalize on the evolving cryptocurrency market. Bitcoin as a Strategic Asset SOS operates a Bitcoin mining facility in Wisconsin and has positioned itself as a notable player in the crypto ecosystem. The company noted Bitcoin’s growing appeal, driven by favorable U.S. regulatory developments and increasing adoption. SOS Chairman and CEO Yandai Wang highlighted the cryptocurrency’s robust market performance, bolstered by the launch of Bitcoin-related ETFs and supportive policy shifts. While Bitcoin is currently trading at an average of $93,000 per coin, SOS anticipates its value surpassing $100,000 soon. The investment is part of a broader strategy to drive long-term shareholder value and strengthen the firm’s market position. Market Reaction The announcement significantly impacted SOS’s stock performance. On November 27, shares on the New York Stock Exchange surged by 43%, closing at $9.93, with after-hours trading pushing the price to $11.36. Within 24 hours of the announcement, the stock saw a dramatic 79.5% increase, rising to $12.48. This rally could help offset SOS’s year-to-date losses of 86.5%, a decline that had previously triggered a noncompliance warning from the NYSE. Broader Corporate Trend in Bitcoin SOS’s move is part of a growing trend among corporations to diversify into Bitcoin. Semler Scientific, for instance, recently acquired 297 BTC between November 18 and November 22, bringing its total holdings to 1,570 BTC, valued at $117.8 million. Similarly, video platform Rumble revealed a $20 million Bitcoin purchase on November 25, leading to a 13% boost in its stock price. This wave of corporate Bitcoin acquisitions coincides with shifting U.S. political dynamics. Expectations of a favorable regulatory environment under Donald Trump’s leadership, including potential plans to establish a national Bitcoin reserve, have further fueled interest. Industry leaders suggest these developments could create a regulatory boost, fostering growth in digital asset markets. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

뉴스제목: Bitcoin ($BTC) keeps everyone guessing - up or down from here?
본문: Bitcoin ($BTC) holders, and those looking to long or short the number one cryptocurrency, are currently indecisive. Bitcoin all but reached the $100,000 price level, but has been rather volatile since then. Is there more downside to come, or is this just another period of consolidation before Bitcoin shoots much higher? Long-term holders take profits, but a smaller percentage each time For the average retail investor, who perhaps hasn’t been in the Bitcoin trading/investing space very long, a rather difficult decision is perhaps being mulled over. The king of the cryptocurrencies recently reached the incredibly important milestone of $100,000 (or just a couple of hundred dollars short of it). Market wisdom says that these big round figures are likely levels where many investors will be taking profits. Indeed, this has very likely happened. Long-term investors use these landmark levels to sell part of their bags into the huge liquidity that accumulates as these levels are reached. However, be that as it may, long-term holders are selling a smaller percentage of their Bitcoin as time goes on. During the latest price surge long-term holders have sold just less than 4% of their holdings , while in the run-up to the 2017 bull market peak, around 25% of long-term holdings was sold, and in 2021 the figure was 13.4%. Three trendlines in play Source: TradingView The daily chart for $BTC shows that since almost hitting the $100,000 level, the price has generally been going down and sideways for almost a week so far. This is par for the course after hitting such a stand-out price level, and a period of absorption is absolutely to be expected. Three trendlines are currently in play. The first, and shortest trendline, is displaying the down and sideways movement for the last few days. The ascending trendline, taken from 12 November, shows the run-up to the all-time high. This trendline has now been broken, and price is still being rejected from this line. The last trendline, and easily the most important, stretches all the way back to the double top of the last bull market in 2021. It seems that the $BTC price is struggling to definitively get above this trendline, and stay there. The trend is your friend Source: TradingView Zooming out into the 2-week timeframe, it can be observed how the $BTC price had an extremely difficult time to finally break through the old all-time high set at the top of the 2021 bull market. That said, the last 2-week candle was the first to open above the $69,000 horizontal level, and it towers above it, reaching all the way to the ascending trendline. The current 2-week candle is battling with that trendline, plus the psychological $100,000 level. If one looks at the bottom of the chart, the Stochastic RSI is heading up nicely, showing that there is room for a lot more upside. The oft-said market wisdom that “the trend is your friend, until the end” is probably very pertinent here. New traders and investors take heed. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

뉴스제목: SEC Receives Filing For Bitwise 10 Crypto Index ETF
본문: Bitwise is looking to convert its index fund tracking the top 10 cryptocurrencies by market cap into an exchange-traded fund. On Nov. 27, Bitwise’s filing was uploaded to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC)’s website. The filing took the form of an application from the NYSE Arca, a major U.S. exchange specializing in exchange-traded products (ETPs), to list and trade shares of the Bitwise 10 Crypto Index Fund as an ETP. The Bitwise 10 Crypto Index Fund currently trades as a trust, offering weighted exposure to the ten-largest digital assets by market capitalization. 뉴스제목: SHIBSHOOT vs. BlockDAG Presale Showdown: Which Project Will Deliver the Biggest Wins for Its Holders?
본문: The crypto market is filled with diverse projects, with some standing out for their creative utility while others for their growth potential. Take SHIBSHOOT, a meme-inspired token in the final stages of its presale, blending gaming elements with community-focused features. However, its long-term success will depend on how well it performs once it’s listed on exchanges. Then there is BlockDAG (BDAG) , a presale project showing clear signs of success by shattering records and setting high expectations. It has recently raised $20 million in just two days, bringing its total presale to over $150 million. Early backers have already enjoyed a remarkable 2240% stake increase, solidifying BlockDAG’s position as the top presale crypto. SHIBSHOOT: Memes Meet Gaming Perks SHIBSHOOT is a meme-inspired cryptocurrency that combines playful visuals with gaming features. It introduces a cowboy-themed Shiba Inu world where users engage in entertaining games while exploring staking and community engagement utilities. While it has gained attention for its creative approach, the project’s true potential depends on its post-presale success. The SHIBSHOOT presale is in its final stages, with 35% of the token supply allocated for early backers. The project aims to launch on both decentralized and centralized exchanges, focusing heavily on marketing and liquidity. Features like “Cactus Staking” allow users to lock tokens for rewards, adding utility to the ecosystem. Despite its unique premise, SHIBSHOOT faces several challenges. Meme-based tokens often struggle to maintain relevance once the initial excitement fades. Additionally, the project’s reliance on its community and gaming features makes it vulnerable to market fluctuations and user engagement drop-offs. 뉴스제목: CryptoAutos Announces Launch Date for $AUTOS Token Sale: Merging Blockchain with Luxury Cars
본문: London, United Kingdom, November 28th, 2024, Chainwire CryptoAutos , the world’s first blockchain-powered luxury automotive marketplace, announces the launch of its native $AUTOS Token. Starting with a Fixed Price Community Launch on Fjord Foundry on December 3rd 2024, which will run for 3 days, followed by the Token Generation Event (TGE) and exchange listings in the coming weeks. At the core of the CryptoAutos ecosystem, $AUTOS introduces blockchain-driven solutions for transactions, staking, governance, and user engagement. With a Community Launch model, the platform prioritises community-driven, decentralised token distribution over venture capital. To mark the launch, CryptoAutos is offering a chance to win a Lamborghini Urus , showcasing its blend of blockchain innovation and luxury. Transforming Luxury Car Ownership with $AUTOS The $AUTOS token aims to redefine how people interact with luxury cars, offering flexibility, transparency, and security. It facilitates seamless transactions, removes traditional banking barriers, provides a native token for the upcoming RWA platform and enables participation in the Gold membership service for the marketplace. Beyond transactions, $AUTOS empowers its community through decentralised governance, giving users a voice in shaping the platform’s future. It also incentivises loyalty with discounts, exclusive offers, and potential rewards, while providing dealers with advertising solutions within the CryptoAutos ecosystem. Through their luxury automotive marketplace, CryptoAutos is bringing to market one of the most powerful crypto to fiat off-ramps in the industry, giving real world utility to top tokens like, $BTC, $ETH, $BNB and many more. CryptoAutos has already generated over $58m in sales revenue to date through their automotive marketplace , and just recently completed the first ever car sale in $TON. Setting a New Benchmark for Token Launches CryptoAutos wants to raise the bar with its Community Launch model with Fjord Foundry, meant to ensure equal access and transparency for all participants. By allocating 110 million $AUTOS tokens through a public sale and securing up to $750,000 USDT in liquidity, the platform is prioritising a sustainable, community-driven approach over traditional VC funding. Exploring the Future of Luxury on Blockchain “We are so excited to finally bring $AUTOS to the global stage,” said Waqas Nizam, Co-Founder & CEO . “This launch isn’t just about a token, it’s about redefining how people own and interact with luxury assets, bridging blockchain technology with real-world value.” About CryptoAutos CryptoAutos is the world’s first blockchain-powered luxury automotive marketplace, offering a secure and transparent platform for purchasing high-value vehicles with cryptocurrency. By integrating Web3 technologies, CryptoAutos simplifies the buying process, providing a seamless experience for car enthusiasts and investors alike. Through its innovative $AUTOS token, CryptoAutos connects blockchain technology with real-world assets, creating a new standard for luxury ownership. 뉴스제목: Cardano Enhances Light Wallet Functionality with Lace 1.17.5
본문: Cardano has taken significant strides in advancing its blockchain technology, introducing new features that promise to enhance scalability, efficiency, and user experience. The release of Lace 1.17.5, an update to its light wallet, and the deployment of the first zero-knowledge (ZK) smart contract on its mainnet are indicative of the platform’s commitment to innovation. These developments aim to streamline wallet functionality, integrate advanced cryptographic tools like zero-knowledge proofs, and position Cardano as a leader in the evolving blockchain landscape. Cardano's Latest Upgrade: Lace 1.17.5 Brings Innovation to Light Wallets and Strengthens Ecosystem Cardano (ADA), the blockchain platform ranked as the ninth-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization, has unveiled a transformative update to its light wallet with the release of Lace 1.17.5. This latest version of the wallet for the Cardano blockchain is poised to significantly enhance user experience while reinforcing the platform’s position in the constantly evolving cryptocurrency space. The Lace 1.17.5 update places a strong emphasis on improving the wallet's functionality and usability. With enhanced syncing speeds and upgraded transaction data fetching capabilities, the new version promises a more efficient and user-friendly interface for Cardano users. This marks a crucial step in ensuring that even users dealing with complex blockchain data can have a seamless experience. Some key upgrades in the latest release include fixes to Nami Mode, Conway Era compatibility, and Shared Wallet functionalities. These bug fixes are designed to streamline wallet operations, providing users with greater reliability and ease of use. The Cardano development team has credited user feedback as a driving force behind these improvements. According to the team, the active participation of the community in providing suggestions and identifying issues has been instrumental in shaping the update. Encouraging continued engagement, the team has called on users to share their experiences with the newly launched version. The release of Lace 1.17.5 is not an isolated development; it forms part of Cardano’s broader strategy to solidify its ecosystem through consistent innovation. Beyond wallet enhancements, the platform has achieved significant milestones that demonstrate its role as a leader in blockchain technology. Recently, Cardano made headlines by deploying its first zero-knowledge (ZK) smart contract on the mainnet. This groundbreaking development marks the beginning of ZK applications on the Cardano blockchain, opening doors to a range of secure and efficient blockchain functionalities. Zero-knowledge technology is lauded for its ability to verify data without revealing the data itself, making it a game-changer for privacy-centric applications. Expanding Horizons: Bitcoin and DeFi Integration Cardano’s roadmap is not confined to its native blockchain. The platform is venturing into decentralized finance (DeFi) applications with plans to integrate Bitcoin into its ecosystem. Charles Hoskinson, the founder of Cardano, envisions a future where users can interact with decentralized applications (dApps) and utilize Bitcoin directly on the platform. This initiative aims to enhance Bitcoin’s utility by introducing features like direct spending through dApps and expanding its potential for use in DeFi. Hoskinson believes this approach could bridge gaps in Bitcoin's current infrastructure while aligning with Cardano’s mission of fostering innovation and accessibility in blockchain technology. By enabling DeFi features on Bitcoin, Cardano aims to empower users with tools that were previously limited to advanced blockchain networks. As the platform continues to develop, the team’s efforts to integrate Bitcoin into its DeFi ecosystem and the successful deployment of ZK smart contracts are a telling sign of the team’s ambition to expand its influence across the cryptocurrency industry. With a focus on community-driven development and technological advancement, Cardano is well-positioned to drive adoption and redefine the future of blockchain. Users and developers are encouraged to explore the new wallet update and provide feedback, ensuring that Cardano remains a blockchain built by and for its community. Cardano Enters the Era of Zero-Knowledge Applications with First ZK Smart Contract Deployment Cardano, one of the leading blockchain networks, has reached a groundbreaking milestone with the deployment of its first zero-knowledge (ZK) smart contract on the mainnet. This achievement, confirmed by Sebastien Guillemot, co-founder of dcSpark, signals the beginning of a new era for the Cardano ecosystem, opening doors to advanced cryptographic capabilities and innovative decentralized applications (dApps). The pioneering ZK smart contract was executed by Cardano’s core development team, Input Output, leveraging Halo 2 technology for ZK verification. Developed by Electric Coin Company, the creators of Zcash, Halo 2 is a cutting-edge zkSNARK proving system that enables the creation and verification of cryptographic proofs without requiring a trusted setup. This makes it an ideal choice for enhancing security and efficiency in blockchain transactions. The first transaction under this new framework was designed to lock funds on the blockchain. A subsequent transaction, which validated the Halo 2-generated ZK proof, was used to unlock these funds. Notably, the unlocking transaction incurred a fee of 2.03 ADA, equivalent to approximately $1.90—a figure Input Output describes as ”reasonably low” for such advanced functionality. Zero-knowledge proofs (ZKPs) are a powerful cryptographic tool that allows one party to prove that a computation was performed correctly without revealing the underlying data. In the context of blockchain, this innovation is transformative, as it provides a mechanism to enhance privacy, scalability, and interoperability without compromising transparency or trust. Input Output highlighted the benefits of Halo 2’s cryptographic capabilities in a detailed social media thread. One standout feature is recursive proofs, which allow complex computations to be divided into smaller, manageable parts. This not only improves scalability by optimizing resource usage but also enhances interoperability by enabling seamless integration with other systems. The deployment of Halo 2 on Cardano marks a significant step toward achieving the blockchain's goals of scalability, efficiency, and security. By integrating zero-knowledge proofs, Cardano is poised to address some of the most pressing challenges in the blockchain industry, including: Scalability: Recursive proofs enable Cardano to handle more extensive and complex computations efficiently, paving the way for mass adoption and support for sophisticated dApps. Privacy: ZKPs allow sensitive data to remain private while still proving the validity of transactions, a crucial feature for industries like finance, healthcare, and supply chain management. Interoperability: The modular nature of computations facilitated by ZKPs can enhance collaboration between Cardano and other blockchain networks. “This test by IO Research represents a significant step forward in the use of zero-knowledge proofs with Cardano, bringing with it a powerful combination of scalability, efficiency, and further enhanced security,” Input Output stated. While acknowledging the milestone, the team also emphasized that further work lies ahead to fully realize the potential of ZK technology on Cardano. What This Means for Cardano’s Ecosystem The integration of ZK technology on Cardano’s mainnet is expected to catalyze a wave of innovation within its ecosystem. Developers can now explore new use cases for dApps that leverage ZKPs for privacy-preserving operations, complex computations, and cross-chain collaborations. This move also strengthens Cardano’s position as a leading blockchain network equipped to meet the demands of next-generation applications. While this milestone is monumental, it is only the beginning for Cardano in its journey to harness the full potential of zero-knowledge technology. The team at Input Output has expressed its push to refine and expand the capabilities of ZKPs on the platform. As the ecosystem evolves, further innovations are anticipated, potentially transforming Cardano into a hub for privacy-centric and scalable decentralized applications. As Cardano continues to break new ground with zero-knowledge proofs, its community and stakeholders can look forward to a future of enhanced functionality, security, and interoperability. This achievement not only elevates Cardano’s status within the blockchain industry but also serves as a strong indication of its role in shaping the next generation of decentralized technology.

뉴스제목: SOS Ltd Rallies 40% After $50 Million Bitcoin Purchase Announcement
본문: China-based financial services giant SOS Ltd saw its stock skyrocket by over 40% on November 27 after unveiling plans to invest $50 million in Bitcoin. The company, which operates a Bitcoin mining facility in Wisconsin, stated that its board approved the move as part of its strategy to position Bitcoin as a core asset in its portfolio. In an official statement , SOS chairman and CEO Yandai Wang stated Bitcoin’s growing significance as a “store of value and a strategic asset,” citing recent market resilience and favorable regulatory shifts in the United States. The firm plans to use strategies such as arbitrage and trading to optimize returns while managing price volatility. The announcement caused SOS Ltd (SOS) shares to jump 43% by the close of trading, reaching $9.93. After-hours trading extended the gains by another 14.5%, with the stock climbing to $11.36. A Turnaround Amidst a Troubled Year This boost comes as a rare bright spot in an otherwise challenging year for SOS. The company’s stock has plummeted by 86.5% in 2024, prompting a noncompliance warning from the New York Stock Exchange in August. The stock’s current performance pales in comparison to its all-time high of $84,900 in October 2017. SOS Ltd’s bold Bitcoin play follows a trend among firms looking to capitalize on the cryptocurrency’s extraordinary rally. Bitcoin surged approximately 40% in November, hitting a high of $99,860 on Coinbase on November 24. Recent market enthusiasm has been driven by developments such as the launch of Bitcoin-related ETFs and improving regulatory clarity in the U.S. digital asset sector. Industry-Wide Bitcoin Moves Gain Traction SOS Ltd isn’t the only company pivoting to Bitcoin to bolster its fortunes. On November 25, video platform Rumble announced a $20 million Bitcoin purchase , which sent its stock up nearly 13%. Similarly, Genius Group, an education provider integrating artificial intelligence, allocated $10 million to Bitcoin earlier this month and revealed plans to hold up to 90% of its reserves in the cryptocurrency. Despite these bold moves, critics remain cautious, highlighting the risks associated with market volatility and the challenges of profitability. For SOS, its Bitcoin gamble could either mark the beginning of a turnaround or add another chapter to its ongoing struggles. As Bitcoin price continues to hover near $100,000 , the growing institutional interest underscores the cryptocurrency’s evolving role in corporate strategies. However, only time will reveal whether these high-stakes investments will pay off. The post SOS Ltd Rallies 40% After $50 Million Bitcoin Purchase Announcement appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

뉴스제목: Altcoin Season Index Hits 60 as Bitcoin Rally Challenges Market Liquidity
본문: The Altcoin Season Index registered 60, signaling strength in altcoins versus Bitcoin. Bitcoin’s rally is driven by institutional demand, limiting fresh liquidity for altcoins. Altcoins need independent strategies and real-world utility to attract new capital. The Altcoin Season Index, tracked by CoinMarketCap , hit 60 on November 28. While slightly lower than the previous day’s 61, the market remains firmly in altcoin season , where the top 100 coins outperform Bitcoin overall. However, the current Bitcoin rally, fueled by institutional demand and ETFs, may reduce liquidity for smaller altcoins, making it harder for them to reach new highs. Market analysts say the altcoin season continues if 75% of these assets outperform Bitcoin over the past 90 days. This metric excludes stablecoins and wrapped tokens, providing a clearer picture of overall market dynamics. Updated daily by CoinMarketCap (CMC), the Altcoin Season Index shows the shifting relationship between Bitcoin and altcoins. This trend often signals a change in market cycles, as retail investors turn their attention to alternative tokens. 뉴스제목: Bitcoin Miners Approach $40B Market Cap as Difficulty Set for Fifth Straight Increase
본문: Publicly traded bitcoin (BTC) miners are approaching the milestone of an aggregated $40 billion market cap, according to Farside data, doubling in seven months as bitcoin's price rocketed through multiple record highs to approach six figures for the first time.   Miners' biggest challenge is revenue. The reward they receive for confirming blocks on the Bitcoin blockchain was cut 50% in April, when their combined market cap was about $20 billion. In this current epoch, only 450 bitcoin are mined a day and fees paid to miners remain at cycle lows, just 10 BTC ($946,000) on Nov. 27 according to Glassnode data.      That means they either have to diversify revenue streams or produce bitcoin at a cheaper cost than the spot price, currently about $96,000.  That's a challenge that is about to become more difficult. The mining difficulty, which measures how hard it is to produce the blockchain's blocks, is expected to increase by a further 3% at some point in the next few days.  Mining difficulty, already firmly above 1 trillion, automatically adjusts every 2016 blocks or roughly every two weeks. The higher the difficulty, the harder — and costlier — for miners to produce a new block.    The heart of the issue is the soaring hashrate, which has held above 700 exahash per second (EH/s) for more than a month. The hashrate is the computational power required to mine and process transactions on a proof-of-work blockchain like Bitcoin.  On a seven-day moving average, the hashrate is currently at 726 EH/s, continuing to put in higher highs and higher lows since mid-year, according to Glassnode data.    In 2024, many miners have diversified their revenue streams by pivoting into the AI and high-performance computing (HPC) industries, where there is soaring demand for locations that can host the computing power they need.   One example is IREN (IREN), whose shares surged 30% on Wednesday on renewed AI interest.  Other, such as MARA Holdings (MARA), are leveraging their bitcoin stashes and bumping up their bitcoin balance sheet holdings. As of Nov. 27, MARA added a further 703 BTC after selling a 0% $1 billion convertible note to raise the funds. The company now owns a total 34,794 BTC.  The CoinShares Valkyrie Bitcoin Miners ETF is a proxy for publicly traded miners. Its share price is up 60% year-to-date, which is underperforming bitcoin's 113%.

뉴스제목: Analyst Says If You Hold XRP, You Will Be Very Rich Soon
본문: Crypto analyst Robert Doyle, better known as Crypto Sensei, has made bold predictions about XRP, claiming that anyone holding the asset could experience massive wealth soon. In a recent video , Doyle highlighted XRP’s recent surge past a critical 7-year resistance level as a key indicator of its potential for explosive growth. He emphasized that XRP's market momentum, combined with growing institutional adoption, makes it one of the most promising assets in the crypto space.According to Doyle, one of the biggest catalysts for XRP’s rise is the ongoing transition in global financial systems. He pointed out that Ripple has secured major partnerships with several Latin American banks, positioning XRP as a leader in cross-border payments. Furthermore, he discussed theories suggesting that the FedNow payment system could use XRP for instant transactions via various partners. However, this remains unsubstantiated .Doyle also examined broader trends in the cryptocurrency market, including growing institutional interest in crypto and the shift toward tokenized value. Moreover, he spoke about the increasing likelihood of a gold-backed currency system, with XRP serving as the bridge for these new gold-backed assets.Becoming “Very Rich” with XRPWith growing global acceptance and expanding use cases across various sectors, Crypto Sensei believes that XRP is on the verge of a massive rally, and those holding the token are in for significant gains.Specifically, he speculated that if XRP could capture just 4-5% of the global financial market, the value of XRP could skyrocket to $30 or even $50. Notably, XRP is worth $1.48 today, boasting a seven-day growth of 33%.Reaching $30, as Doyle suggested, requires a growth of 1,927%, which is nearly 20X for those buying XRP today. Meanwhile, the upper target of $50 suggests a more promising 3,278% upside. Other commentators, like Wall Street analyst Linda Jones, have made similar projections for XRP , citing a recurring four-year cycle pattern. In this case, $1,000 committed to XRP today could amount to $33,783 with $50 per token.While this prospect seems promising, some analysts have dismissed the possibility of XRP seeing such growth in this current cycle. Conservative analysts have projected that XRP’s destination for this cycle is around $5 to anything below $10.

뉴스제목: Former CFTC Chair Predicts SEC Will Drop Ripple Case
본문: Former Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) Chair Chris Giancarlo has predicted that the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (CFTC) will drop the case against Ripple. The former CFTC Chair is known as “Crypto Dad,” thanks to his progressive views on digital assets. Ripple’s Fight Against The SEC Coming To An End? Ripple’s lengthy legal battle with the Securities and Exchange Commission has seen significant developments after Gary Gensler confirmed he was stepping down. Speculation of the case being dropped entirely under new leadership has grown significantly. The lawsuit dates back to December 2020, when the SEC accused Ripple and its executives of illegally raising $1.3 billion through an unregistered securities offering by selling its native cryptocurrency, XRP. However, there is renewed optimism of a resolution after Donald Trump’s presidential win. The president-elect had promised to fire Gensler on his first day in office. These developments led to a substantial jump in the price of XRP, with speculation growing that the legal battle would be resolved under Gensler’s successor. Former CFTC Chair Chris Giancarlo said the SEC may drop the case against Ripple under the Trump administration. “I would recommend that regulatory agencies drop many of these cases where they’ve lost. I think they should drop the XRP case. I would bet that they would.” The former CFTC Chair has previously argued that XRP should not be classified as a security. This view aligns with a July 2023 ruling by Judge Torres, which found certain XRP transactions did not qualify as securities sales. Giancarlo has been highly critical of Gensler’s leadership and has pointed at high turnover, diminished morale, and overreach in enforcement action. Giancarlo supports the creation of a “crypto council” to ensure a coordinated, strategic approach to crypto policy under the Trump administration. He also proposed a list of potential candidates for the SEC leadership, including Paul Atkins and Kevin Hassett, who, according to him, will bring expertise and a commitment to innovation. Potential Scenarios Attorneys Jeremy Hogan and Fred Rispoli discussed potential scenarios for the legal battle between Ripple and the SEC under new leadership. Hogan believes the commission may dismiss all non-fraud crypto lawsuits over the years. He also believes Ripple and the SEC will settle the lawsuit for the previously ruled $125 million. Hogan stated, “It would be awkward to settle for less than what was already decided by a court. The Coinbase and other cases in litigation will simply be dismissed. This will take some time, not January, but before Summer. That’s my call, and I’m sticking to it.” Meanwhile, Rispoli believes dropping the lawsuit is unrealistic and said the $125 million penalty is the biggest win the SEC can get. He also predicted the SEC’s new leadership will recognize the “case was idiotic and settle at that point.” “This might include a reduction in the fine and an agreement that current sales of XRP by Ripple are sufficiently structured to not be investment contracts.” Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.
